import React from 'react'; import caloriesIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/calories-icon.png'; import proteinsIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/protein-icon.png'; import fatIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/fat-icon.png'; import carbsIcon from '../../../images/icons/icons-small/carbs-icon.png' import './NutritionalInfo.css' const NutritionalInfo = ({ calorieCount, proteinCount, carbohydrateCount, fatCount }) => { return (
{calorieCount.toLocaleString()}kCal Calories
{proteinCount}g Prot√©ines
{carbohydrateCount}g Glucides
{fatCount}g Lipides
); } export default NutritionalInfo;
